description.raw:
I ran into a linking problem while working on: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/22.

The gazebo gui plugins would not find the gazebo gui system without this change.

To test:

1. Install #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/22
2. Don't install this PR.
3. Run: `ign launch -v 4 plugins/gazebo_plugins.ign`

You should see messages like:
```
Error while loading the library [/home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so]: /home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so: undefined symbol: _ZTIN8ignition6gazebo2v29GuiSystemE
[GUI] [Err] [Application.cc:334] Failed to load plugin [Scene3D] : couldn't load library on path [/home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so].
```

I ran into a linking problem while working on: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/22.

The gazebo gui plugins would not find the gazebo gui system without this change.

To test:

  1. Install #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/22
  2. Don't install this PR.
  3. Run: ign launch -v 4 plugins/gazebo_plugins.ign

You should see messages like:

Error while loading the library [/home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so]: /home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so: undefined symbol: _ZTIN8ignition6gazebo2v29GuiSystemE
[GUI] [Err] [Application.cc:334] Failed to load plugin [Scene3D] : couldn't load library on path [/home/nkoenig/local/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libScene3D.so].

title: Fix gui plugin linking issue
